title: Deep Learning Specialization
subtitle: 16 week Deep Learning class where I learnt about Convolutional networks, RNNs, LSTM, Adam, Dropout, BatchNorm, Xavier/He initialization, and more. I worked on case studies from healthcare, autonomous driving, sign language reading, music generation, and natural language processing

title: Machine Learning
subtitle: 11 week Machine Learning class where I studied Supervised learning, Unsupervised learning and applied the knowledge in numerous case studies and applications, soto building smart robots (perception, control), text understanding (web search, anti-spam), computer vision, medical informatics, audio and database mining.

title: Ph.D. in Theoretical Particle Physics
subtitle:
**Thesis:** The QCD Strong Coupling from Hadronic Tau Decays

 Writing a C++ program to extract the strong coupling from CERN within the framework of QCD Sum Rules. Analysing the effects of Quark-Hadron Duality. Probing the validity of FOPT and CIPT.

title: Ph.D. in Theoretical Particle Physics
subtitle:
**Thesis:** The QCD Strong Coupling from Hadronic Tau Decays

 Writing a C++ program to extract the strong coupling from CERN within the framework of QCD Sum Rules. Analysing the effects of Quark-Hadron Duality. Probing the validity of FOPT and CIPT.

title: M.Sc. in Theoretical Particle Physics
subtitle:
**Thesis:** 1-Loop Anomalous Dimensions of 4-Quark Operators

 Specializing in theoretical physics with topics as Quantum Field Theory and the Standard Model, while finding a new working group under the lead of Prof. Dr. Matthias Jamin at the Institute of High Energy Physics (IFAE) of the Universitat Aut√≤noma de Barcelona. Right now researching Low-energy QCD and the determination of Standard Model Parameters.

**Thesis:** Band Structure Studies of Graphene and Modified Graphene Structures

 Working in the group of Prof. Dr. Roser Valent√≠ at the Institute of Theoretical Physics of the Goethe Universit√§t Frankfurt (Germany).Writing my first scientific work ‚ÄôBand structure studies of graphene and modified graphene structures‚Äô, after understanding the techniques of density functional theory and many body problems.
title: B.Sc. in Theoretical Condensed Matter Physics
Anomalous dimensions of four-quark operators and renormalon structure of mesonic two-point correlators

title: MetLife Iberia Financial Inclusion Award

subtitle: Our team #kiwi won the price for the most confident team with a #blockchain based solution. We tried to democratize data to set the right incentives for an optimized data value creation. With the help of the blockchain we give the user (data producer) the full power of his owned data and make it ( if the user allows it ) anonymized available for any data scientist who can add value. These data scientists then upload their models to our API and we sell the outcomes on our data market place. Every time a client demands a prediction from our market place he has to pay the data scientist and the user, which is immutable organized in a smart contract. For fun we also created #adidasium an #ICO which could be adidas own monetary system
title: Adidas Hackathon Finals: Winner of the Most Confident Team

subtitle: Winner of the #adidasHackathonBCN!!! This weekend I joined an amazing team #kiwiü•ù of 5 persons to develop a full fledge facial recognizer. Within the last 48h we created a system that could uniquely identify your face and track emotions to a very accurate level. We used this to train a model to predict the probability of a client purchasing a certain item in an #adidas store.
title: 1st Place at the Adidas Hackathon (Barcelona)

subtitle: I developed a blockchain solution with the spanish winning team of the global legal hackathon for the project panopticon. panopticon is a legal tech solution to enhance cross-border supply chain compliance with blockchain and smart contracts.
title: Panopticon Smart Contract

subtitle: Developed legal tech tool that helps companies and other agents to easily take decisions, whether in shareholders meetings, the board of directors or any other circumstance which requires a consensus of several persons. Digitalizing the democratic process of defining the future of a company, our tool was based on the blockchain and smart contracts to help the deciding boards creating secure minutes whenever they want from wherever they want.
title: 2nd Place in Global Legal Hackathon (Madrid)
